item.title: Discord’s Family Center update now lets parents monitor weekly purchases
item.description: Discord has rolled out updates to its Family Center, giving guardians more insights into their teens’ usage patterns, including purchases, top interactions, and time spent. The goal is to help parents monitor whether their teen is spending excessive time or money on Discord. The communication platform first launched Family Center in 2023 with an activity […]...

item.title: AI video commercials are starting to spread, but people won't trust uncanny valley endorsements
item.description: As AI-generated avatars replace real people in commercials, brands risk losing consumer trust to an uncanny, emotionally hollow marketing strategy.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for November 6, 2025
